TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IcmpV6Statistics extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供本地计算机的 Internet 协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) Internet 控制消息协议的统计数据。

span.span: Provides Internet Control Message Protocol for Internet Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) statistical data for the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ICMPV6 是错误和信息性消息以用于 Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 的一组。ICMPV6 is a set of error and informational messages for use with Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6). 使用此类方法以返回 ICMPV6 流量信息。This class is used by the method to return ICMPV6 traffic information. 此类中的属性与管理信息基础对象的 ICMPv6 IETF RFC 2466 中定义相关联。The properties in this class correlate to the Management Information Base objects for ICMPv6 defined in IETF RFC 2466. ICMPv6 RFC 2463 中定义。ICMPv6 is defined in RFC 2463. ## Examples 以下示例显示当前 ICMPv6 统计信息。The following example displays the current ICMPv6 statistics. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数可以仅由派生的类名为。This constructor can be called only by classes that derive from .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DestinationUnreachableMessagesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long DestinationUnreachableMessagesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取由于无法到达数据包的目标地址而接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) messages received because of a packet having an unreachable address in its destination.

value.span: 值，指定接收的“无法到达目标”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Destination Unreachable messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法到达目标的消息可以发送到任何以下原因是数据包的源计算机：A Destination Unreachable message can be sent to the computer that is the source of a packet for any of the following reasons: - 在计算机找不到的目标地址的路由。The computer cannot find a route to the destination address. - 从管理上禁止与目标地址的通信。Communication with the destination address is administratively prohibited. 例如，防火墙会阻止数据包的传递到目标。For example, a firewall prevents delivery of packets to the destination. - 无法访问目标地址。The destination address is unreachable. - 无法访问目标端口。The destination port is unreachable. 例如，没有可用于数据包的协议的任何侦听器。For example, there is no listener available for the packet's protocol. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#32)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#32)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#32)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DestinationUnreachableMessagesSent As Long
public: abstract property long DestinationUnreachableMessagesSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取由于无法到达数据包的目标地址而发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) messages sent because of a packet having an unreachable address in its destination.

value.span: 值，指定发送的“无法到达目标”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Destination Unreachable messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法到达目标的消息可以发送到任何以下原因是数据包的源计算机：A Destination Unreachable message can be sent to the computer that is the source of a packet for any of the following reasons: - 在计算机找不到的目标地址的路由。The computer cannot find a route to the destination address. - 从管理上禁止与目标地址的通信。Communication with the destination address is administratively prohibited. 例如，防火墙会阻止数据包的传递到目标。For example, a firewall prevents delivery of packets to the destination. - 无法访问目标地址。The destination address is unreachable. - 无法访问目标端口。The destination port is unreachable. 例如，没有可用于数据包的协议的任何侦听器。For example, there is no listener available for the packet's protocol. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#32)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#32)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#32)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property EchoRepliesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long EchoRepliesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 回送答复消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Echo Reply messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收到的“ICMP 回送答复”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of number of ICMP Echo Reply messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回送请求和回显回复消息，计算机可以从网络上的远程计算机请求的 ICMP 响应。Echo Request and Echo Reply messages allow a computer to request an ICMP response from a remote computer on a network. 此功能通常用于确定远程地址的有效性。This functionality is often used to determine the validity of remote addresses. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#30)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#30)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property MembershipQueriesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long MembershipQueriesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 组管理协议 (IGMP) 组成员查询消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Group management Protocol (IGMP) Group Membership Query messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收的组成员查询消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Group Membership Query messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多播的路由器发送组成员查询消息，若要了解哪些组具有每个其附加的物理网络上的成员。Multicast routers send Group Membership Query messages to learn which groups have members on each of their attached physical networks. 主计算机响应通过为每个主机通过联接的多路广播组发送组成员身份报告的组成员查询消息。Host computers respond to a Group Membership Query message by sending a Group Membership Report for each multicast group joined by the host. 主计算机加入新的多路广播的组时，还可以发送组成员身份报告。A host computer can also send a Group Membership Report when it joins a new multicast group. 当主计算机离开多路广播的组发送组成员减少消息。Group Membership Reduction messages are sent when a host computer leaves a multicast group. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#34](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#34)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#34](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#34)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#34)]

public: abstract property long MembershipQueriesSent { long get(); };

value.span: 值，指定接收的 ICMPv6 消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMPv6 messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ICMPv6 消息发送的错误以及有关使用 Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 发送的数据包的信息进行通信。ICMPv6 messages are sent to communicate errors and information about packets sent using Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6). ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#33)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#33)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#33)]

public: abstract property long MessagesSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) messages sent.

value.span: 值，指定发送的 ICMPv6 消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMPv6 messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ICMPv6 消息发送的错误以及有关使用 Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 发送的数据包的信息进行通信。ICMPv6 messages are sent to communicate errors and information about packets sent using Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6). ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#33)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#33)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#33)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property NeighborAdvertisementsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long NeighborAdvertisementsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 邻居广播消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Neighbor Advertisement messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收的 ICMP 邻居广播消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Neighbor Advertisement messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 邻居发现是通过主机计算机和路由器可以确定地址邻居已知驻留在共享链接上一个过程。Neighbor Discovery is a process whereby host computers and routers can determine the addresses for neighbors known to reside on shared links. 此发现流程的一部分被通过称为邻居请求和邻居播发 ICMP 消息。Part of this discovery process is accomplished using ICMP messages called Neighbor Solicitations and Neighbor Advertisements. 若要发现的邻居的链路层地址或验证邻居仍可以访问通过缓存的链路层地址发送邻居请求消息。Neighbor Solicitation messages are sent to discover the link-layer address of a neighbor or to verify that a neighbor is still reachable via a cached link-layer address. 包含的地址信息的邻居公告是发送响应请求，或要宣布的地址更改。A Neighbor Advertisement that contains address information is sent in response to a solicitation or to announce an address change. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#35](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#35)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#35](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#35)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#35)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property NeighborAdvertisementsSent As Long
public: abstract property long NeighborAdvertisementsSent { long get(); };

value.span: 值，指定发送的邻居广播消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Neighbor Advertisement messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 邻居发现是通过主机计算机和路由器可以确定地址邻居已知驻留在共享链接上一个过程。Neighbor Discovery is a process whereby host computers and routers can determine the addresses for neighbors known to reside on shared links. 此发现流程的一部分被通过称为邻居请求和邻居播发 ICMP 消息。Part of this discovery process is accomplished using ICMP messages called Neighbor Solicitations and Neighbor Advertisements. 若要发现的邻居的链路层地址或验证邻居仍可以访问通过缓存的链路层地址发送邻居请求消息。Neighbor Solicitation messages are sent to discover the link-layer address of a neighbor or to verify that a neighbor is still reachable via a cached link-layer address. 包含的地址信息的邻居公告是发送响应请求，或要宣布的地址更改。A Neighbor Advertisement that contains address information is sent in response to a solicitation or to announce an address change. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property PacketTooBigMessagesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long PacketTooBigMessagesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 数据包太大消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Packet Too Big messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收的 ICMP 数据包太大消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Packet Too Big messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 路由器发送数据包太大消息时不能转发数据包，因为它是大于传出链接的最大传输单位 (MTU)。A router sends a Packet Too Big message when a packet cannot be forwarded because it is larger than the maximum transmission unit (MTU) of the outgoing link. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#36](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#36)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#36](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#36)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#36](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#36)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ParameterProblemsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long ParameterProblemsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 参数问题消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Parameter Problem messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收到的“ICMP 参数问题”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Parameter Problem messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数问题消息发送时的主机或路由器在处理数据包标头，如遇到无效的 IPv6 选项或无效的下一标头类型的内容时遇到问题。Parameter Problem messages are sent when a host computer or router encounters problems while processing the contents of a packet header, such as encountering a invalid IPv6 option or a invalid Next Header type. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#39](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#39)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#39)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#39)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ParameterProblemsSent As Long
public: abstract property long ParameterProblemsSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 参数问题消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Parameter Problem messages sent.

value.span: 值，指定已发送的“ICMP 参数问题”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Parameter Problem messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数问题消息发送时的主机或路由器在处理数据包标头，例如，遇到了无效的 IPv6 选项或无效的下一标头类型的内容时遇到问题。Parameter Problem messages are sent when a host computer or router encounters problems while processing the contents of a packet header, such as encountering an invalid IPv6 option or an invalid Next Header type. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#39](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#39)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#39)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#39)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property RedirectsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long RedirectsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 重定向消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Redirect messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收到的“ICMP 重定向”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Redirect messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由路由器发送重定向消息以通知的目标地址的更好地路由的主机计算机。Redirect messages are sent by routers to inform a host computer of a better route for a destination address. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#37](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#37)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#37](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#37)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#37](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#37)]

public: abstract property long RedirectsSent { long get(); };

[!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#37](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#37)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#37](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#37)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#37](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#37)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property RouterAdvertisementsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long RouterAdvertisementsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 路由器广播消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Router Advertisement messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收的路由器广播消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Router Advertisement messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主机计算机可以将其直接附加的子网之外的 IP 数据报发送之前，它必须发现至少一个在该子网上的路由器的地址。Before a host computer can send IP datagrams beyond its directly attached subnet, it must discover the address of at least one router on that subnet. 可使用称为路由器播发和路由器请求 ICMP 消息来完成此发现。This discovery can be accomplished using ICMP messages called Router Advertisements and Router Solicitations. 公告消息是由路由器发送定期地宣布其状态显示和其接口的地址。An Advertisement message is sent by a router periodically to announce its presence and the addresses of its interfaces. 当计算机连接到网络，而不等待接收路由器公告时，它可以发送路由器请求来请求路由器立即发送其公告。When a computer connects to a network, rather than waiting to receive Router Advertisements, it can send Router Solicitations to request that routers send their advertisements immediately. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#40)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#40)]

public: abstract property long RouterAdvertisementsSent { long get(); };

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Router Advertisement messages sent.

[!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#40)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#40)]

value.span: 值，指定发送的路由器请求消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Router Solicitation messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主机计算机可以将其直接附加的子网之外的 IP 数据报发送之前，它必须发现至少一个在该子网上的路由器的地址。Before a host computer can send IP datagrams beyond its directly attached subnet, it must discover the address of at least one router on that subnet. 可使用称为路由器播发和路由器请求 ICMP 消息来完成此发现。This discovery can be accomplished using ICMP messages called Router Advertisements and Router Solicitations. 公告消息是由路由器发送定期地宣布其状态显示和其接口的地址。An Advertisement message is sent by a router periodically to announce its presence and the addresses of its interfaces. 当计算机连接到网络，而不等待接收路由器公告时，它可以发送路由器请求来请求路由器立即发送其公告。When a computer connects to a network, rather than waiting to receive Router Advertisements, it can send Router Solicitations to request that routers send their advertisements immediately. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#40)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#40)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property TimeExceededMessagesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long TimeExceededMessagesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 超时消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Time Exceeded messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收到的“ICMP 超时”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Time Exceeded messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据包的跃点的限制确定被放弃前可转发的次数。A packet's Hop Limit determines how many times it can be forwarded before it is discarded. 每次转发数据包时，它的跃点的限制值之递减一个。Each time a packet is forwarded, its Hop Limit value is decremented by one. 当跃点限制为零时或路由器收到其跃点限制设置为零的数据包时，将丢弃数据包和数据包的源接收指示初始跃点限制已太小或路由中捕获到数据包的时间超过了消息ting 循环。When the Hop Limit reaches zero or when a router receives a packet with its Hop Limit set to zero, the packet is discarded and the source of the packet receives a Time Exceeded message indicating that the initial Hop Limit was too small or that the packet was caught in a routing loop. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#38)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#38)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#38)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property TimeExceededMessagesSent As Long
public: abstract property long TimeExceededMessagesSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 超时消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Time Exceeded messages sent.

value.span: 值，指定已发送的“ICMP 超时”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Time Exceeded messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据包的跃点的限制确定被放弃前可转发的次数。A packet's Hop Limit determines how many times it can be forwarded before it is discarded. 每次转发数据包时，它的跃点的限制值之递减一个。Each time a packet is forwarded, its Hop Limit value is decremented by one. 当跃点限制为零时或路由器收到其跃点限制设置为零的数据包时，将丢弃数据包和数据包的源接收指示初始跃点限制已太小或路由中捕获到数据包的时间超过了消息ting 循环。When the Hop Limit reaches zero or when a router receives a packet with its Hop Limit set to zero, the packet is discarded and the source of the packet receives a Time Exceeded message indicating that the initial Hop Limit was too small or that the packet was caught in a routing loop. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#38)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#38)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#38)]
